## FieldDropdown.shouldAddBorderRect\_() method

Whether or not the dropdown should add a border rect.

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected shouldAddBorderRect_(): boolean;
```
**Returns:**

boolean

True if the dropdown field should add a border rect.
